title: The Wolf of the Highlands
description: Ray Barrett is a man struggling to forget a life that brought him nothing but heartache and disappointment. He seeks solace in the mountains where he encounters a lone wolf who begins to follow him. Little does he know that this wolf is not what he appears to be, but someone who will take him on a quest through different experiences that span vast periods of time; experiences that will teach him valuable lessons about himself and life.
author: Bil Howard (Author of MacGregor's Wolf: Lessons of Time)
